title: NIAB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 14 Technical Assistant, Young Professional and Other Posts
description: The National Institute of Animal Biotechnology (NIAB) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the 14 vacancies for Technical Assistant, Young Professional, and Project Research Scientist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Pharm, B.Sc, M.Pharm, M.Sc, MVSc, M.Phil/ Ph.D can grab this chance and apply for the NIAB Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the...
